item.title: Four Years of Open Source —— Three Unexpected Rewards
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Some say open source is useless, yielding neither profit nor time savings. But through four years of dedication, I’ve discovered three unexpected rewards: increased visibility for my work, connections with exceptional people and projects, and the accumulation of long-term value. These rewards are applicable to every developer.
